Create the recommended files architecture

Source: R/create_files_architecture.R
create_files_architecture.Rd

Create the recommended files architecture.

Usage

create_files_architecture(path = NULL, main_folder_name = NULL)

Arguments

path

chr. The path where to create the main folder

main_folder_name

chr. The name of the main folder

Examples


if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{

# Run it to create the folder to your desktop, change the path if needed

create_files_architecture(
path = file.path(Sys.getenv("USERPROFILE"),"Desktop"),
main_folder_name = 'UAV_observatory_data'
)

} # }
